promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic special parrot psychic-type with a golden beak. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or parrot. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Glimlord, a gigantic special parrot psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: barrier. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word parrot or psychic or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, parrot-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Glimlord is a majestic Pokémon that lives in dark caves. It soars and glides effortlessly, warding away danger with its magical shield.
